sentences.en: a 55 mph speed limit
sentences.cn: 55英里的时速限制

sentences.en: a 60 mph speed limit
sentences.cn: 每小时60英里的限速

sentences.en: a decision to limit imports of foreign cars
sentences.cn: 限制进口外国汽车的决定

sentences.en: A speed limit of 30 mph was introduced in built-up areas.
sentences.cn: 在建筑密集区域，车速限制为每小时30英里。

sentences.en: He was found to be three times over the limit.
sentences.cn: 他血液中的酒精浓度是允许极限的3倍。

sentences.en: He was nearly three times over the drink drive limit.
sentences.cn: 他超过醉酒驾驶规定标准快三倍了。

sentences.en: I think there is an age limit, but I'd have to check.
sentences.cn: 我觉得有年龄限制，不过我得去核实一下。

sentences.en: In some cases there is a mini-mum age limit.
sentences.cn: 有些情况下有最低年龄限制。

sentences.en: Seating is limited to 500.
sentences.cn: 座位限定在 500个。

sentences.en: She was breathalysed and found to be over the limit.
sentences.cn: 她接受了呼气测醉检查，结果超过了限定值。

sentences.en: The public is not allowed within a 2-mile limit of the missile site.
sentences.cn: 众不得进入导弹发射场两英里范围内。

sentences.en: The speed limit on the freeway is 55mph.
sentences.cn: 高速公路限速每小时55英里。

sentences.en: The three month time limit will be up in mid-June.
sentences.cn: 3个月的限期截至6月中旬。

sentences.en: The wrong choice of club might limit your chances of success.
sentences.cn: 选错俱乐部也许会限制你成功的机会。

sentences.en: There is a limit to the amount of pain we can bear.
sentences.cn: 我们能忍受的疼痛是有限度的。

sentences.en: there was no topic that was off limits for discussion.
sentences.cn: 没有什么禁止讨论的话题。

sentences.en: they declared the site off limits.
sentences.cn: 他们宣布该地禁止入内。

sentences.en: They struggled to limit the cost by enforcing a low-tech specification.
sentences.cn: 他们通过实施低技术规格拼命限制成本。

sentences.en: to reduce the speed limit in built-up areas
sentences.cn: 在楼房林立的地区降低最高车速限制

sentences.en: We have extended the time limit for claims until July 30.
sentences.cn: 我们已经把索赔期限延长到了7月30日。

sentences.en: You should always keep to the speed limit.
sentences.cn: 什么时候你都不得超过最高速度限制。

words.tran_cn: 限制；限度；极限；追诉时效；有效期限
[机][电] 限制器，[电子] 限幅器；限制者

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)十分讨厌的，令人气恼的

trans.tran_en: the greatest or least amount, number, speed etc that is allowed
to stop an amount or number from increasing beyond a particular point

trans.tran_cn: 限制， 限定； 减少
trans.tran_en: to stop an amount or number from increasing beyond a particular point
